entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
